page.title: 03LEISURE AND RECREATION.
page.content: { Mortimer Hall}is a small, modern building situated on the corner of {Oxford Rd}on the outskirts of{Old} {Marston.}It is used for many social meetings and occasions but its main function is its small{library}with a varied range of books. There are two librarians, a part-timer and one who works full time. Although the building is fairly new it has a lot of problems with damp and rot. There are also clubs held in the hall. One such club that we found out about was a dancing school under the name of{'Sue's Dancing School'.}It is a small association, run for the young children of the area who like to start dancing early. There is also a small hall opposite {St Nicholas' Church}which is used in conjunction with the church. It too is used for social occasions.
